doc:
Charles McGregor https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_McGregor 0 Charles McGregor (September 1, 1922 – August 11, 1996) was an African American actor, best known for his role as Fat Freddie in Super Fly. In his youth, he spent a number of years in prison. During the 1970s, he became an actor and played supporting roles in several blaxploitation films. After his film career, he toured the United States and went to junior high schools and high schools, counseling children on the dangers of crime, drugs and prison. In 1980, he married Carolyn Pryor. He wrote his autobiography, called Up From the Walking Dead: The Charles McGregor Story with Sharon Sopher. He died on August 11, 1996. Charles_McGregor ( September_1_,_1922 – August_11_,_1996 ) was an_African_American_actor , best_known for his_role as Fat_Freddie in Super Fly . In his_youth , he spent a_number of years in prison . During the_1970s , he became an_actor and played_supporting roles in several_blaxploitation_films . After his_film_career , he toured the_United_States and went to junior_high_schools and high_schools , counseling children on the_dangers of crime , drugs and prison . In 1980 , he married Carolyn_Pryor . He wrote his_autobiography , called Up From the_Walking_Dead : The_Charles_McGregor_Story with Sharon_Sopher . He died on August_11_,_1996 .
